snippet.title: Black Myth: Wukong - Pre-Orders Now Available | August 20, 2024 - Confront Destiny
snippet.description:
Embark on an epic journey with "Black Myth: Wukong", a single-player action RPG developed by Game Science, inspired by the classic "Journey to the West". The game will be globally released on August 20, 2024, at 10:00 AM Beijing Time (UTC+8) and will be available on PS5, Steam, Epic Games Store, and WeGame.

The pre-order CG trailer premiered at the 2024 Summer Game Fest Opening Ceremony, and digital pre-orders are now live across multiple platforms. Details of the physical Deluxe Edition and Collector's Edition have also been revealed.

Please note that the release dates for the physical Deluxe Edition and Collector's Edition may differ from the digital pre-order start date. Stay tuned to our official announcements for more information.

Pre-order now to receive a special in-game reward, the "Trailblazer's Scarlet Gourd", upon the game's launch.

X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/BlackMythGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BlackMythGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blackmythwukong.official/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@blackmythwukong.official
Visit our official website for more details: https://www.heishenhua.com
